media.headline: Mathis chases down a foul ball
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Mathis slides and snags Crawford's foul ball
media.bigblurb: Jeff Mathis hustles and snags Brandon Crawford's foul ball behind the plate with a great sliding catch in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Hill's solo home run
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Hill crushes a solo home run to left field
media.bigblurb: Aaron Hill cracks a solo home run to deep left field to give the Giants a 1-0 lead in the top of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Crawford's RBI single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Crawford singles to left and plates Belt
media.bigblurb: Brandon Crawford singles on a ground ball to left field that scores Brandon Belt, extending the Giants' lead to 2-0 in the top of the 4th

media.headline: Peralta's solo homer to left
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Peralta sends a solo shot to left field
media.bigblurb: David Peralta lifts a solo shot to left field to get the D-backs on the board in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Goldschmidt's solo shot to right
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Goldschmidt cranks a solo homer to right
media.bigblurb: Paul Goldschmidt tees off and sends a deep solo home run to right field to tie the game at 2 in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Samardzija's batting practice
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Samardzija tees off during batting practice
media.bigblurb: Jeff Samardzija showcases his batting and tees off three home runs during batting practice

media.headline: Posey's RBI double
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Posey doubles to left field, scores Pence
media.bigblurb: Buster Posey doubles off a ground ball down the left-field line and plates Hunter Pence to give the Giants a 3-2 lead in the top of the 6th

media.headline: David Johnson takes some swings
media.blurb: SF@ARI: David Johnson joins batting practice
media.bigblurb: Arizona Cardinals running back David Johnson joins the D-backs during batting practice and takes a few swings

media.headline: Baxter teases Bumgarner
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Baxter messes with Bumgarner before the game
media.bigblurb: Baxter has some fun and messes with Madison Bumgarner before the game at Chase Field

media.headline: Lamb's three-run home run
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Lamb's three-run homer puts D-backs up, 5-3
media.bigblurb: Jake Lamb sends a drive to right-center field for a three-run home run, giving the D-backs a 5-3 lead in the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Hazelbaker's RBI single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Hazelbaker singles to send Herrmann home
media.bigblurb: Jeremy Hazelbaker slaps a line-drive single to center field and plates Chris Herrmann to extend the lead to 6-3 in the bottom of the 6th

media.headline: Delgado avoids bat for the out
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Delgado dodges a broken bat and makes a play
media.bigblurb: Randall Delgado fields a comebacker on the mound and avoids a broken bat to make the play at first in the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Pollock's two-run double
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Pollock doubles to left field, drives in pair
media.bigblurb: A.J. Pollock sends a double to left field to bring Jeff Mathis and Nick Ahmed home, extending the D-backs' lead to 8-3 in the 8th

media.headline: Peralta's RBI double
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Peralta plates Pollock with a double
media.bigblurb: David Peralta sends a double to left field and plates A.J. Pollock, pushing the lead to 9-3 in the bottom of the 8th inning

media.headline: Ray fans Belt in the top of 6th
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Ray gets Belt swinging in the 6th inning
media.bigblurb: Robbie Ray punches out Brandon Belt as he gets him swinging in the top of the 6th inning, his sixth strikeout of the game

media.headline: Peralta, Goldy go back-to-back
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Peralta, Goldschmidt hit back-to-back homers
media.bigblurb: The D-backs showcase their batting as David Peralta and Paul Goldschmidt tee off for back-to-back home runs in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Recap: SF 3, ARI 9
media.blurb: 4/6/17: D-backs tally nine runs in win over Giants
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: The Arizona Diamondbacks' offense was on fire as it tallied three home runs and 11 hits in a 9-3 win over the Giants

media.headline: 4/6/17 CG: SF@ARI
media.blurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: SF@ARI
media.bigblurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: SF@ARI

media.headline: Lovullo on 9-3 victory
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Lovullo on the 3-1 start for the season
media.bigblurb: D-backs manager Torey Lovullo discusses Arizona's hot start, hot offense and dominating performances against the Giants

media.headline: Lamb talks game-winning home run
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Lamb discusses game-winning home run
media.bigblurb: Jake Lamb discusses his three-run home run that propelled the D-backs to a 9-3 win over the Giants

media.headline: Bochy on loss to Arizona
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bochy talks 9-3 loss to D-backs, series loss
media.bigblurb: Bruce Bochy discusses losing the series after the Giants' 9-3 defeat to the D-backs at Chase Field
